### Quarto file creation

[write_reference()](write_reference.qmd)


&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Writes the reference pages and index as Quarto files

[write_reference_index()](write_reference_index.qmd)

[write_reference_pages()](write_reference_pages.qmd)


&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Converts the 'Rd' file into Quarto, and writes the file to a specified folder
